knowledge.badge: Knowledge: Deceptive Signs and Misread Omens
knowledge.heading: Deceptive Signs and Misread Omens
knowledge.description: The text explores how signs and omens can mislead rather than guide, creating false hope in the face of approaching doom. What appears to promise good fortune actually conceals fatal reality.
knowledge.pattern_connection: The fatalistic stance of Investigative Fatalism reveals how retrospective investigation exposes the ironic gap between hopeful interpretation and predetermined tragedy.

device_examples.quote: Any dream about birds means good health
device_examples.effect: Contrasts optimistic interpretation with fatal reality, showing how signs deceive rather than warn.

device_examples.quote: he felt completely spattered with bird shit
device_examples.effect: Transforms the supposedly positive bird omen into visceral contamination and doom.
